input.prompt:
Fix the code for Phase 7: Edge Cases and Polish

GOAL:  Handle edge cases for long text, special characters, many tasks, and ensure responsive behavior

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA:
- Long task text wraps to multiple lines without overflow
- HTML characters like `<script>` display as literal text
- Emojis display correctly in tasks
- List scrolls when tasks exceed viewport height
- App works on 320px wide viewport
- All buttons and checkboxes have minimum 44px touch target
- Tab key navigates through all interactive elements in logical order
- Focused elements have visible focus indicator (uses #2563eb accent color)
- App remains responsive with 100+ tasks

REVIEWER FEEDBACK:
- The app needs to be optimized for smaller viewports, particularly at 320px. Consider using media queries and flexible layouts.
- The app becomes unresponsive with an increasing number of tasks. Performance optimization is required to handle more than a few items without issues.
